articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Industrial Establishments in Huichon City
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Industrial Establishments in Huichon City
Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to industrial establishments in Huichon City.
					The first leg of his guidance was the Huichon General Machine-Tool Plant.
					
					After being briefed on the modernization of the plant, he acquainted himself in detail with various production processes and newly manufactured machine tools to get familiar with the progress made in the  technical updating and modernization and production there. 
					
					 After learning in detail about the capacity and mechanism  and principles of operation of the newly-contrived and manufactured machine tools, he  expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the plant have produced a lot of efficient machine tools as required by the new century by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm. He highly appreciated the feats performed by them. 
					
					 Saying that the position and role of the plant in the nation's economic development are very important, he set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the plant. 
					
					 Noting that the material and technical foundation of the Juche-oriented industry of the country has grown stronger thanks to the positive activities of the reliable machine-tool plants in recent years, he underscored the need to equip the plant better to be a model plant in the IT age. 
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Youth Electrical Complex.
					
					 He got familiar with the production there, examining various products turned out by the complex. 
					
					The complex has a very important duty to perform in putting the technical revolution on a higher level, he said, indicating tasks to be fulfilled by the complex to keep the production going at a high rate and ways to do so. 
					
					 He also gave field guidance to the Huichon Precision Machine Plant.
					
					 He made the rounds of various production processes including the piston shop to learn in detail about technical equipment and production there. 
					
					 He said that the reality in which the number of vehicles has rapidly increased requires greater quantities of accessories.
					
					 In order to satisfactorily meet the rapidly growing needs for accessories it is necessary to energetically push forward the technological updating of the plant to steadily boost the production capacity, he noted, indicating tasks and ways to do so. 
					
					 Pointing out that the spirit of the workers in Huichon courageously dashing with the exceptional enthusiasm to open the gate to a thriving nation before any others is sky-high, he stressed that the DPRK is sure to win final victory as such loyal vanguard is dynamically running ahead of others and it has powerful independent national economy. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Pak To Chun, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Jon Pyong Ho, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Johannesburg
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Johannesburg
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, arrived in Johannesburg on Friday to visit South Africa. 
					 Arriving there together with him were Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun and other suite members.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces Flailed
Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors jabbered that it would offer "government subsidies" to civic and public organizations only when they swear to "abide by the law" that they had never participated in the "illegal" demonstrations in the past and will not take part in them in the future, too.
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea said in its information bulletin No. 948 issued on Saturday:
					
					 The pressure put by the group upon those organizations to make "a written oath to abide by the law" under the pretext of "government subsidies" is aimed to build a fascist dictatorial system as it is a base move to placate those organizations incurring its displeasure with the promise to offer money and abridge and stamp out the freedom of their activities.
					
					 Accusing the group of mobilizing right-wing gangsters to crack down on the progressive forces of the pro-reunification movement, the bulletin continued:
					
					 It has recently let such wicked conservative gangster-like organizations as the "patriotic mobile corps" made up of those possessed of martial arts who once earned ill fame in the puppet marine corps and the special warfare command physically fight against progressive forces.
					
					  The reality clearly proves once again that to what base and desperate methods the group is resorting to suppress the righteous struggle of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification, weaken their forces and build its dictatorial system.
					
					 The Lee group is working hard to get rid of its serious ruling crisis by hatching plots and employing various methods of suppression as it is driven into a tight corner after being rejected by the people's mindset due to its heinous sycophantic and treacherous acts and dictatorial rule enforced under the pretext of "pragmatism" and anti-reunification moves. This is, however, nothing but the last-ditch efforts of the doomed.
					
					 The group would be well advised to stop at once its foolish acts, clearly understanding that with neither plots nor intrigues can it hold in check the struggle of the south Korean people for new independent politics, a new life.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign under Fire
Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is now busy kicking up an anti-DPRK campaign, terming the socialist system in the DPRK a "system abusing human rights." This came under fire by a statement issued on May 9 by a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea. 
					 Some days ago, the group of traitors sent at least 30 defectors from the north to a function of "observing the week of freedom in the north" held in front of the Capitol in Washington under the sponsorship of right-wing conservative organizations of the United States and south Korea to stage a noisy anti-DPRK human rights campaign. The so-called south Korean "ambassador in charge of human rights issue in the north" was also sent there for the first time in the history of the campaign. 
					
					 This "ambassador," when interviewed by the U.S. "Voice of Free Asia," made no scruple of letting loose a spate of provocative outbursts that "it is necessary to build settlements for defectors from the north in the area near the border with the north" and "it is necessary to educate and train them into standard-bearers capable of leading the north to reforms and opening in the future" and "to this end the U.S. should sponsor a multilateral meeting aimed to build the above-said settlements."
					
					 Earlier, the group also sent the head of the puppet planning team for peace and diplomacy to the United States to solicit its American master cooperation in the efforts to settle the "human rights issue in the north", "the issue of defectors from the north" and the "issue of the detained staff member of Hyundai Asan."
					
					 The recent anti-DPRK human rights campaign being recklessly kicked up by the group in league with foreign forces is one more vicious anti-DPRK conspiratorial charade prompted by a sinister intention to internationalize the fictitious "human rights issue in the north" in a bid to impair the daily rising dignity and prestige of the DPRK, justify the group's moves to escalate the confrontation with it and dampen the desire of south Koreans for alliance and brotherhood with the north, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is the Lee group that has turned south Korea into the world's worst tundra of human rights by wantonly trampling down upon people's dignity, independent rights and elementary right to existence. It is, therefore, shameless and ridiculous for it to talk about someone's "human rights".
					
					 As the group is going so reckless to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, daring hurt its dignity and system, it is left with no option but to settle accounts with it by meting out a stern and merciless punishment to it.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression of Pro-Reunification Movement Organizations Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression of Pro-Reunification Movement Organizations Blasted
Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) in a statement on Friday vehemently denounced the simultaneous wholesale suppression of pro-reunification movement organizations including the South Headquarters of Pomminryon perpetrated by the puppet Intelligence Service and police of south Korea from dawn of May 7 as a blatant challenge to the nation's desire for reunification and the inter-Korean joint declarations and an unpardonable anti-reunification and undemocratic fascist act of antagonizing fellow countrymen and escalating national confrontation.
					 It went on:
					
					 The South Headquarters of Pomminryon is a steadfast pro-reunification and patriotic organization to all intents and purposes and its activities are, therefore, entirely righteous and just. The members of such organizations as the South Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and the Federation of Peasants Associations of south Korea who were suppressed this time are patriotic figures who have worked harder than any others for independence and democracy of the south Korean society and national reunification.
					
					 However, the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors perpetrated wholesale suppression of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and pro-reunification and patriotic forces. This is its last ditch efforts to quell the desire for implementing the north-south joint declarations growing stronger in south Korea than ever before, completely hold in check the pro-reunification and patriotic activities and tide over its ruling crisis caused by its unpopular rule.
					
					 It will be impossible to expect social democracy and independent reunification unless the ill-famed "National Security Law" is abolished and an end is put to the Lee group's fascist dictatorship and its moves for national confrontation.
					
					 Pomminryon will conduct a courageous struggle together with all the Koreans at home and abroad supportive of the June 15 joint declaration and desirous of reunification to bring earlier national reunification, foiling the group's suppression.
					
					 The group of traitors would be well advised to clearly remember that the preceding fascist rulers met a miserable end while working hard to block reunification and violate democracy.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors' Crackdown upon Pro-Reunification Movement Organizations Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors' Crackdown upon Pro-Reunification Movement Organizations Flayed
Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) and the People's Solidarity for Abrogation of the "National Security Law" held a press conference on May 7 in front of the puppet Intelligence Service in protest against the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' fascist crackdown upon the pro-reunification movement organizations. 
					 Speakers at the conference warned that no suppression on the part of the Lee group can destroy Pomminryon. The further the group intensifies the suppression, the closer the forces of the reunification movement will unite to turn out in the struggle for national reunification, they added.
					
					 A press release read out at the conference charged that the Lee "government's" crackdown upon the South Headquarters of Pomminryon was an anti-reunification action openly disclosing its intention to totally negate the south-north declarations and illegalize all the progressive reunification activities in a bid to bring the inter-Korean relations back to the era of the Cold War.
					
					 It was, at the same time, fascist tyrannical action to hold in check the just activities of the progressive camp against the moves to make a retrogressive revision of the "Lee Myung Bak evil laws", it said, adding:
					
					 Civic and public organizations will wage a vigorous struggle till the detained leading members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon are released and join the people in their actions to have the NSL, the evil law of the times against democracy, human rights and reunification, repealed.
					
					 On the same day, the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the Democratic Labor Party, the Solidarity for Progress in Wonju and the Kangwon Provincial Federation of the Federation of Peasants Association separately issued statements condemning the puppet authorities for their fascist acts of searching the office rooms of organizations under the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and the organizations affiliated to it and houses of their leading members and a sweeping roundup.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Liberation Tower and Cemetery of Fallen Soviet Army Soldiers
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Liberation Tower and Cemetery of Fallen Soviet Army Soldiers
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower Saturday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of Russia's victory in the great Patriotic War.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Ambassador Valery Sukhinin and staff members of the Russian embassy and diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 The participants placed the wreath in the name of the Russian embassy before the tower and paid a silent tribute to the fallen Soviet army soldiers.
					
					 They also laid a wreath and bouquets at the cemetery of the fallen Soviet army soldiers in Sadong District, Pyongyang.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- A Jilin provincial people's government delegation of China headed by Vice-Governor Chen Weigen arrived here on Saturday.
					 Also arriving to participate in the 12th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair were delegations from China, Malaysia, Sweden, Singapore, Australia, Vietnam, Thailand, and Taipei of China.
					
					 Delegations and delegates from Russia, Syria, Austria, Italy and Turkey arrived here earlier.

articles.title: Architectural Festival Held
articles.content:
Architectural Festival Held
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The 9th May 21 architectural festival took place in Pyongyang.
					 The festival opened on May 5 involved a contest in various designs for putting structures on a formative and artistic basis including blueprints for laying out provincial seats, cities and county seats and designs for indoor football gymnasiums and railway stations, a presentation of scientific papers in the fields of architecture and construction and a contest in architectural design programs and multimedia.
					
					 Entries into the festival included nearly 200 designs presented to the contest, at least 260 scientific papers and more than 40 programs and multimedia.
					
					A closing ceremony was held at the Central Youth Hall on May 8.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- A new stamp (one kind of sheetlet) has been issued in the DPRK on the occasion of the International Stamp Exhibition now under way in Germany.
					 The letters "100th Anniversary of Zeppelin Airships" and "IBRA '09 International Stamp Exhibition" are printed on the sheetlet and it reflects various kinds of airships.
					
					 A new stamp (one kind of sheetlet) has been also brought out on the 23rd Asian International Stamp Exhibition which will be held in Hong Kong.
					
					 Seen in the sheetlet are the letters "23rd Asian International Stamp Exhibition Hong Kong 2009". It is compiled with four stamps showing camping life of schoolchildren.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Increased Dependence on Foreign Forces Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Increased Dependence on Foreign Forces Blasted
Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are busy pulling up the DPRK over its decisive action taken to restart its nuclear facilities and start reprocessing spent fuel rods, blustering that "the north's threat of nuclear proliferation poses a worldwide problem" and it is necessary for the international community to "tighten sanctions against it." During the recent ministerial meeting of the Coordinating Committee of the Non-aligned Movement held in Cuba, too diplomats sent by them were busy with the moves to slander and insult the DPRK over its satellite launch.  
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This ridiculous act can be perpetrated only by those traitors steeped in the idea of depending on foreign forces and standing in confrontation with fellow countrymen to the marrow of their bones, bereft of even an iota of consciousness of being members of the Korean nation. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is going reckless in their moves to realize its ambition for invading the DPRK in league with foreign forces but this is nothing but a day-dream. 
					
					 The group's increasing dependence on foreign forces and escalated confrontation with fellow countrymen would only compel the army and people of the DPRK to bolster its nuclear deterrent for self-defense in every way. 
					
					 As proven by the reality today when the military tension is escalating and the danger of war growing with each passing day, Koreans are bound to suffer horrible misfortune as long as the above-said traitors are allowed to stay within the nation. 
					
					 All the Koreans will never pardon those traitors but force them to pay for their crimes without fail, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Fated to Face Stern Judgment
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Fated to Face Stern Judgment 
Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- All the candidates from the "Grand National Party" (GNP) were defeated in the "National Assembly by-election" held in south Korea in late April, bringing the worst election failure to the party of traitors.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes: Though it was "by-election", it assumed the nature of making "an intermediary judgment" of all the policies pursued by the Lee Myung Bak regime during more than one year of its office and reflected the mind-set of the south Korean people. In this aspect the outcome of the election was a fair yet stern judgment made by the south Korean people upon the group of traitors swimming against the desire of the nation and the trend of the times.
					
					  The news analyst cites facts to prove that the present ruling quarters of south Korea have behaved quite contrary to the mind-set of the south Korean people by enforcing the unpopular and traitorous policies during this period. A ray of hope entertained by south Korean people for the "pragmatic government" was completely dashed, leaving them greatly disillusioned with the group of traitors and angered at it, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 In a word, the outcome of the election was people's stern judgment and warning to the Lee group of traitors which has gone arrogant, quite contrary to the mind-set of the south Korean people.
					
					 The GNP is now busy eradicating the aftermath of the election failure, trumpeting about what it called "personnel reshuffle" and the like. This is, however, nothing but a cynical ploy of those who still do not properly know what people's mind-set is like. What the south Korean people want is a total drop of the traitorous policies going against the desire of the nation and the trend of the times and an immediate resignation of the "pragmatic government." 
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to behave itself, seriously accepting the results of the election as the stern warning of the angered people to it and their firm will to put an end to the traitorous policy without fail.

articles.title: End to History of Cooperation with Outsiders Called for
articles.content:
End to History of Cooperation with Outsiders Called for
Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article calls on the Korean nation to put an end to the inglorious history of cooperation with foreign forces in south Korea which hurts the interests of the nation in order to overcome difficulties in the way of the June 15 era of reunification and push ahead with the cause of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					 The conservative ruling forces in south Korea are bedeviling the inter-Korean relations while getting hell-bent on cooperation with outsiders against the nation and driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 This behavior can never be pardoned as it is an anachronistic act of treachery hindering the cause of national reunification and bringing the danger of a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The foreign aggressor forces do not want Korea's reunification but wish to see the continued inter-Korean confrontation on the peninsula, proceeding from their wild ambition to dominate it. To antagonize compatriots with whom to join hands for reunification while cooperating with outsiders against the reunification of the nation is a heinous act of treachery little short of opposing the reconciliation and unity of the nation and negating the reunification.
					
					 The group of traitors' desperate move for cooperation with foreign forces is aimed to continue pursuing the anti-reunification "policy toward the north" censured by the entire nation with the full support and backing of outsiders and thus realize its ambition to escalate confrontation with compatriots at any cost.
					
					 Cooperation with the U.S. which intends to achieve the wild ambition to dominate the whole of Korea at any cost by launching even a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula while dampening the Koreans' desire for detente and peace on the peninsula is as foolish an act as watering a war mill.
					
					 Should the Lee Myung Bak group stand against the nation while pursuing cooperation with foreign forces utterly disregarding the national cooperation, desire of the fellow countrymen and requirements of the times, it will meet denunciation of all the Koreans and stern punishment of the history.

articles.title: Sycophancy of Puppet Military toward U.S. Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Sycophancy of Puppet Military toward U.S. Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a news conference in Seoul on May 6 denouncing the military authorities' despicable sycophancy and submission to the U.S. 
					 Speakers at the news conference accused the U.S. of pressurizing the south Korean authorities to pay rents for the houses of the families of the service members of the U.S. to be built in the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek. 
					
					 They charged that at a time when millions of families are left homeless the authorities, indifferent to their wretched plight, are busy with the move to cover the above-said rents.
					
					 They declared that the "Ministry of Defense" should never be allowed to spend a huge amount of money for the U.S. troops, which should be channeled into stabilizing people's livelihood.
					
					 They demanded the military authorities fully clarify the contents of the agreement made with the U.S. over the above-mentioned rents and immediately cancel the plan for the expansion of the said base.
					
					 They also urged the "National Assembly" to start the probe into the truth about the ministry's sycophancy and submission to the U.S.

articles.title: Korea's Peaceful Reunification Supported in Austria
articles.content:
Korea's Peaceful Reunification Supported in Austria
Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation sent a solidarity letter to the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea on the occasion of May Day. 
					The letter said that the Songun politics pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il is of decisive significance in the struggle of the workers and other people in the DPRK for consolidating and developing socialism in the DPRK and opening the gate to a thriving nation till 2012, in particular.
					
					 The letter noted that the above-mentioned organization is confident that they will further develop the socialist cause by frustrating ceaseless provocations of the U.S. imperialists and its followers.
					
					 The DPRK's present development serves as a shining symbol of the superiority of socialism to capitalism, the letter held.
					
					The letter demanded the U.S. stop all military exercises and provocations against the DPRK, put an end to illegal sanctions against it and withdraw the U.S. troops from south Korea and urged the south Korean authorities suppressing the movement of trade unions to step down.
					
					 It expressed belief that the day is sure to come when Korea is reunified peacefully.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam llega a Johannesburg
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam llega a Johannesburg
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, llego el dia 8 a Johannesburg en compania del ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun y otros para realizar una visita a la Republica Sudafricana.

articles.title: Direccion nortena de APRP condena feroz represion de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Direccion nortena de APRP condena feroz represion de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ATCC) -- A partir de la madrugada del dia 7, el Servicio de Inteligencia y la policia titeres del Sur de Corea libraron simultaneamente la operacion represora de gran envergadura contra las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion, incluyendo la direccion surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP).
					  Al publicar el dia 8 una declaracion, la direccion nortena de la APRP condeno categoricamente esa campana represora calificandola de desafio frontal a la aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion y a las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y de imperdonable accion fascista anti-reunificacion y anti-democracia que hostiliza a los connacionales y agrava la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					 Son sumamente justas las actividades de la direccion surena de la APRP, firme organizacion patriotica que lucha por la reunificacion, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					 Igualmente, los miembros de las entidades, que esta vez han sido blancos de represion, incluyendo el Comite Sureno de la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la "Confederacion Nacional de las Sociedades de los Campesinos", son personalidades patrioticas quienes vinieron luchando mas que nadie por la independencia y la democratizacion de la sociedad surcoreana y por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 A pesar de esto, la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak lanzo la represion general contra la direccion surena de la APRP y otras fuerzas patrioticas por la reunificacion.
					
					 Esto significa los esfuerzos agonicos de los compinches de Lee por sofocar el ambiente a favor de la ejecucion de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur que se hace cada dia mas fuerte en el Sur de Corea, frustrar totalmente el movimiento por la reunificacion y eludir su crisis de gobernacion en que cayeron debido a sus infames politicas antipopulares.
					
					  Hoy dia, no se puede esperar la democratizacion de la sociedad surcoreana y la reunificacion independiente sin cancelar la infame "ley de seguridad" y acabar con la dictadura fascista de la banda de Lee y sus maniobras en pro de la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  La APRP librara con mas audacia la lucha por adelantar la reunificacion de la patria destruyendo la campana de represion de la banda traidora, junto con todos los coreanos dentro y fuera del pais que apoyan la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y desean la reunificacion.
					
					  La banda del traidor Lee debe recordar bien claro el tragico destino que corrieron los gobernantes fascistas antecesores por haber tratado de impedir la reunificacion y de sofocar la democracia.

articles.title: CRPP condena sucia campana contra las fuerzas patrioticas surcoreanas
articles.content:
CRPP condena sucia campana contra las fuerzas patrioticas surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ATCC) --  Recientemente, la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak anuncio que pagaria el "subsidio gubernamental" a las entidades civiles y sociales solo cuando estas firmen el "juramento por escrito de la observancia de la ley" confirmando que no tienen antecedentes de manifestaciones "ilegales" ni las harian tambien en el futuro.
					  Detras de esta sucia marana encaminada a controlar con el dinero a las entidades civiles y sociales, que le caen mal, restringir y suprimir la libertad de sus actividades se halla el objetivo criminal de esa horda de establecer el sistema de dictadura fascista.
					
					Asi senala el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) en su informacion No. 948 publicada este sabado y continua:
					
					De mal en peor, la banda de Lee moviliza ultimamente a los gangsteres derechistas en la represion contra las fuerzas progresistas del movimiento por la reunificacion.
					
					  Especificamente, lanza a la pelea fisica con las fuerzas progresistas a las connotadas entidades de gangsteres conservadores como el llamado "cuerpo movil patriotico" integrado por los practicantes de arte marcial que se granjearon la mala fama durante sus servicios militares en la infanteria de marina y la comandancia de combates especiales del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					  Esta realidad vuelve a demostrar cuan viles y perversas son las maniobras de esa banda para reprimir la justa lucha de los habitantes surcoreanos por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion, debilitarlos y establecer el sistema dictatorial.
					
					 La banda de Lee esta empantanada en el apuro sin salida siendo repudiada por el pueblo por sus extremados actos vendepatrias y serviles a grandes potencias, dominacion dictatorial "pragmatista" y maniobras anti-reunificacion.
					
					 Para salvarse de esta seria crisis de gobernacion, recurre a los intrigantes metodos de represion, lo cual no pasa de ser el ultimo esfuerzo desesperado de los que estan a punto de arruinamiento.
					
					  La camarilla de Lee debe parar ahora mismo esas necias acciones al darse clara cuenta de que no podra frenar con ningun complot la lucha de la poblacion surcoreana aspirante a la nueva politica independiente y la nueva vida.

articles.title: CRPP critica la brutal campana anti- RPDC en el campo de DDHH
articles.content:
CRPP critica la brutal campana anti- RPDC en el campo de DDHH
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 9 una declaracion denunciando a la horda de Lee Myung Bak que lanza la feroz campana contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea calumniando e insultando el regimen socialista de esta con el supuesto "problema de derechos humanos".
					 Hace poco, la camarilla del traidor Lee envio a mas de 30 desertores al Sur de Corea y, por primera vez, al "embajador encargado de DDHH del Norte" al llamado acto de la "semana por la libertad del Norte de Corea", que tuvo lugar frente a la sede del Congreso de Estados Unidos en Washington bajo coauspicios de las entidades derechistas conservadoras norteamericanas y surcoreanas, precisa el documento y prosigue:
					
					 En la ocasion, el citado "embajador" titere del Sur de Corea concedio una rueda de prensa con la "Radio de Asia Libre" de EE.UU., en la cual dijo que "es necesario construir el asentamiento de los fugitivos norcoreanos en la zona limitrofe con el Norte de Corea" y "hay que educar y entrenar alli a ellos como abanderados capaces de conducir al Norte a la reforma y apertura".
					
					 Ademas, insistio en que EE.UU. "debe auspiciar una reunion multilateral para construir tal asentamiento".
					
					  Con anterioridad, la camarilla de Lee habia mandado al "jefe de planificacion de la paz y la diplomacia" a EE.UU. para que suplicara a su amo gringo la cooperacion en el "problema de derechos humanos del Norte", el "de fugitivos norcoreanos" y el "de retencion de un empleado de Hyundai Asan".
					
					  La aventurera y siniestra campana anti-RPDC en materia de DDHH, que libra ultimamente la horda de Lee en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas, deviene otro complot que partio del siniestro intento de manchar la dignidad y el aspecto majestuoso de la RPDC que se elevan cada dia mas, justificar sus maniobras conflictivas con ella y sofocar en el Sur de Corea el clima pro-Norte al internacionalizar ese inexistente "problema de DDHH del Norte".
					
					  Resulta muy descarado y ridiculo el hecho de que quienes estan cuestionando el "problema de DDHH" de alguien son los que convirtieron el suelo surcoreano en la peor tierra de este mundo donde se violan flagrantemente la dignidad, los derechos independientes y hasta el elemental derecho a la vida de los habitantes.
					
					  Puesto que esa horda de traidores persigue demencialmente solo la confrontacion calumniando la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC, esta ajustara la cuenta hasta el final con aquella mediante un castigo rotundo e implacable.
